participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, with a love for animals and a strong work ethic.
participant_1.background: i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for generations. i'm from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm. i dream of moving to the city.

participant_2.name: David Smith
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and humorous, with a passion for storytelling and a love for family.
participant_2.background: horror movies are my favorites. my father used to work for home depot. i've a son who is in junior high school. i spent a decade working in the human services field.
